descriptionlist.description: Three little homescreen widgets matching Stencil theme. Requires XenInfo to function and one of many other tweaks to actually display the widgets! Includes two now playing variants and an icon sized weather widget, each with loads of customisation options. And a special OCD wallpaper to help you line them up with your icon layout.
To add a default image, add your own file "artwork.png" to the folder

changelog.change: Added option to use background art in music widgets
